examples.example: 我已经为实现梦想做好了充分的准备。

translate.english: I have made full preparations for realizing my dream.

examples.example: 我已经成功地完成了这个具有挑战性的任务。

translate.english: I have successfully completed this challenging task.

examples.example: 我已经取得了很大的进步，感到非常开心。

translate.english: I have made great progress and feel very happy.
